text: James Bartlett (9 July 1966 â€“ 23 May 2022) was a British-born South African actor. He was best known for his role as David Genaro,Times Live article on David Genaro in Rhythm City. He was born in Maidenhead, Berkshire, England. His career began in 1984. He also played Sgt. James Gregory in Mandela: Long Walk to Freedom (2013). Bartlett died on 23 May 2022 in Johannesburg, South Africa at the age of 55. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2022 deaths Category:British movie actors Category:British stage actors Category:British television actors Category:South African actors Category:Actors from Berkshire
title: Jamie Bartlett
